trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"></xref> objects.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescriptionCollection"></xref> class.
Removes all items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Powoduje usunięcie wszystkich elementów z kolekcji.

trans-unit.source: The base class calls this method when the list is being cleared.
trans-unit.target: Klasa podstawowa wywołuje tę metodę, gdy lista jest czyszczona.

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.ClearItems%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
Occurs when an item is added or removed.
trans-unit.target: Występuje, gdy element zostanie dodany lub usunięty.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Gets an empty and non-modifiable instance of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescriptionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wystąpienie pusta i nie można modyfikować <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescriptionCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Inserts an item into the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Wstawia element do kolekcji pod określonym indeksem.

trans-unit.source: The base class calls this method when an item is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Klasa podstawowa wywołuje tę metodę, gdy element zostanie dodany do kolekcji.

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.InsertItem%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
The zero-based index where the `item` is inserted.
trans-unit.target: Liczony od zera indeks gdzie `item` jest wstawiany.

trans-unit.source: The object to insert.
Removes the item at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Usuwa element pod określonym indeksem w kolekcji.

trans-unit.source: The base class calls this method when an item is removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Klasa podstawowa wywołuje tę metodę, gdy element zostanie usunięty z kolekcji.

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.RemoveItem%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
The zero-based index of the element to remove.
trans-unit.target: Liczony od zera indeks elementu do usunięcia.

trans-unit.source: Replaces the element at the specified index.
The base class calls this method when an item is set in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Klasa podstawowa wywołuje tę metodę, gdy element jest ustawiona w kolekcji.

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.SetItem%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
The zero-based index of the element to replace.
trans-unit.target: Liczony od zera indeks elementu do zamiany.

trans-unit.source: The new value for the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Nowa wartość elementu pod określonym indeksem.
